body.content:
Dear Swen,

Thank you for your mail and interest indicated, I want to believe that
you are capable to handle this deal with me, Considering your positive
responses and in my anticipation of a strong and solid cooperation
from your side in this business, infarct I am very much interested to
know whether you will be capable to do this business with me in full
confidence trusting that you will never let me down in future OK and
be sure that everything is very very legal and will work out fine fine
as long as we follow the normal procedures of inheritance of we are
working with Top Director in the Lloyds Bank for this transaction. So
if you are really serious to cooperate with me in this deal send your
bank account details without any delay to enable us provide you with
all the legal document's (2) you must have a valid international
passport or travelling documents because you will be required to go to
offshore payment office in Dublin Ireland to signed the final release
order documents in any of our Foreign Payment Office in Dublin Ireland
to sign the documents at the bank counter.

For us to proceed, you should send your account details first let us
start the process getting transfer documents in your name as the
beneficiary to Inherit the fund and you know that the deceased owner
of fund didn't leave "WILL" behind in your name and we have to go
through the law of inheritance to get all necessary documents in your
name as the next of KIN and beneficiary for claim and without these
documents we will not have power over the fund.

Firstly, I must assure you that this business is totally free of risk
and also transparent. I wouldn't have involved myself in this
transaction if it is not safe. This is my over two decades in the
banking cycle. You should give priority to this business if you are
really capable of handling this business that requires great trust and
confidence. Bearing in mind that this is not a regular business that
comes and goes, it is a God sent opportunity and such opportunity
usually comes once in a lifetime. I am Christian and also trustworthy,
I want to assure you that this business is 100% guaranteed and there
will be documents of transfer to prove that the money going into your
a/c is genuine, free from drug/terrorist and money laundering.

You should know that I am not doing this business because of the large
amount that is involved on it but rather in the end the success of
this business will benefit both families from generation to generation
as far as you follow the instruction which I will be getting from our
Insider in the Bank, and you should know that never a business to
succeed without building trust to each other. I promise you that I
will never never let you down in this business either now or in the
future and I need the same from you.

The main reason why I contacted you in this business is because the
original operator of the A/C is a foreigner and this money can only be
approved into a foreign beneficiaries A/C only, frankly speaking from
the bottom of my heart my fear now is the security of this fund in
your custody once I transferred it into your A/C because I don't know
you before nor your capability and facilities to handle this large
amount, but I am now believing you by your and trusting God that you
will never let me down, I really want to know more about yourself and
I want you to keep it very confidential at all times because it is
large amount and be sure that I will get all the necessary documents
to avoid any mistake and we should be maintaining constant
communications between us and you should note that this business
should take precedence over any other business for the mean time since
it could be executed within 7-14banking days new banking system rules
introduced by COVID19 restrictions.

For over many years an unclaimed belonging to a "dead customer" Mr.
Johnson Robert from United States of America who died with his family
on plane crush on 4 January 2012 see (BBC News), Visit the web site
below for confirmation;
http://news.bbc.co.uk/go/em/fr/-/1/hi/uk/2956897.stm It is only me and
2 other top Management staff knows about the fund and if the fund
reaches {Bank of England} as "UNCLAIMED FUND". it will automatically
be seized by the Bank of England.

I am assuring you again and again that the success of this business is
never in doubt, although it will cost us some few thousands of British
pounds to get the Inheritance Documents in your name, that is the
expenses that two of us will input because we will get all the
transaction documents before the money will be approved and released
to go into your nominated bank a/c so you should not entertain any
fear in sending the bank a/c information so that I will start the
processing of the foreign payment Inheritance documents in your name
as the beneficiary, so be rest assured that everything will work out
fine and successful.

Now I need the A/C information as stated below:

1. Your Bank account information where you will like the fund to transfer to:
State your account information as follow:
Bank name:..........??
Bank Address:........??
Account Name:........??
Account Number:.......???
Swift Code No:........??

2. Your Full name and company Name,
Home and Office address.....?
3.copy of your international passport/ID
4. Your whatsApp telephone and fax numbers

I wait to hear from you.
This is my whatsapp number +447760891414 add me or send yours.
Thanks and God Bless You.
Regards,
Mr. William Chalmers.
+447760891414
Group Finance Director
Lloyds Banking Group United Kingdom
http://www.lloydsbankinggroup.com

header.subject: Greetings to you... From:...Mr. William Chalmers...Investment Partnership?
